actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Forests, Family Farms, and Energy

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to dismiss frivolous administrative appeals of decisions made by the Forest Service.
short_title: Forest Service Frivolous Appeals Elimination Act of 1989

summary.text: Forest Service Frivolous Appeals Elimination Act of 1989 - Authorizes the dismissal of administrative appeals of Forest Service decisions under specified conditions.

titles.title: Forest Service Frivolous Appeals Elimination Act of 1989
To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to dismiss frivolous administrative appeals of decisions made by the Forest Service.
